review_title: Wonderful, meaningful job with ethical company
job_title: Peripatetic Support Worker in Bridgwater, England
pros:
I have returned to working in social care after a twenty year gap. I joined the company a month ago and I am very much enjoying my job. The training and support from colleagues has been excellent, covering everything I need to effectively carry out my role. Communication from senior colleagues is transparent and inspiring. Support workers have recently been given a pay rise in advance of the change to minimum wage. 

The dedication and compassion my colleagues show has been a pleasure to be around, as they continue to strive to provide the best support possible to people during a difficult time for social care. Thanks to my colleagues and the wonderful people we support to making me feel so welcomed!
cons: Low pay sector in general (due to low value government places on social care).
